channel.title: 317 Help
channel.description: How do i make a wild zone turn into safe? could some one please help?if you can thanks like i know were to go in client.java public boolean nonWild() { and i get something like this. || (absX >= 2027 && absX <= 2047 && absY >= 4515 && absY <= 4544)//home and i dont know how to make it like a non wild zone for trhe absx and that so if someone could please explain or show me a video about it please.

and i get something like this. || (absX >= 2027 && absX <= 2047 && absY >= 4515 && absY <= 4544)//home
